resources.string: This email id is already registered with us. Please try singing in with this email id or choose a different email id.
You are successfully registered with us. Please click on the email verification link sent to your email account, then continue with login.
You have not verified your email. Please go to your email account and click on the verification link sent. If you have not received the verification mail yet please click on the resend now button.
A verification email is being sent your email account. Please click on the email verification link to verify your email id, then continue with login.
A link to reset your password is being sent your email account. Please click on the link to change your password.
Please enter your registered email id to send password reset link
This email id is not registered with us. Please try again with a different email id or register using this email id.
We encountered some glitch. Please try again.
